title: Issue with Profitability on Home screen and Portfolio tab doesn't load
body:
## Step 1: Have you search for this issue before posting it? Yes

## Step 2: Describe your environment : Windows, Python 3.7.3, Branch Dev, https://github.com/Drakkar-Software/OctoBot/commit/c2dea8e9757a34de007cc6bd4781acbe45d2c2db
 
## Step 3: Describe the problem:
Profitability section from Home screen is not loading. Also, when I click Portfolio tab on the top, the screen doesn't load.  From the logs I see timeout errors.

I ran it against Coinbase Pro exchange.

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

### Steps to reproduce:

Launch OctoBot using CoinbasePro exchange.  Portfolio page should display the information from CoinbasePro site.

### Observed Results:
Page doesn't load.  Also the profitability section of the Home is blank.  while loading the Home page, it had the same error logs, matches with Portfolio tab load.


### Relevant code exceptions or logs:

2019-06-08 21:56:31 ERROR  asyncio_tools        logging_util.py:62       <coroutine object TradesManager.update_portfolio_and_currencies_current_value at 0x0000013303E4E3C8> coroutine took too long to execute, cancelling the task. (current task before starting this one: None, actual current task before cancel: <Task pending coro=<RealTimeEvaluator.start_task() running at f:\Python\Octobot\OctoBot\evaluator\RealTime\realtime_evaluator.py:92> cb=[gather.<locals>._done_callback() at F:\Python\Octobot\python373\lib\asyncio\tasks.py:664]>)
2019-06-08 21:56:31 ERROR  flask.app            app.py:1780     Exception on /portfolio [GET]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "F:\Python\Octobot\python373\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 2311, in wsgi_app
    response = self.full_dispatch_request()
  File "F:\Python\Octobot\python373\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 1834, in full_dispatch_request
    rv = self.handle_user_exception(e)
  File "F:\Python\Octobot\python373\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 1737, in handle_user_exception
    reraise(exc_type, exc_value, tb)
  File "F:\Python\Octobot\python373\lib\site-packages\flask\_compat.py", line 36, in reraise
    raise value
  File "F:\Python\Octobot\python373\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 1832, in full_dispatch_request
    rv = self.dispatch_request()
  File "F:\Python\Octobot\python373\lib\site-packages\flask\app.py", line 1818, in dispatch_request
    return self.view_functions[rule.endpoint](**req.view_args)
  File "f:\Python\Octobot\OctoBot\interfaces\web\controllers\trading.py", line 44, in portfolio
    _, _, portfolio_real_current_value, portfolio_simulated_current_value = get_portfolio_current_value()
  File "f:\Python\Octobot\OctoBot\interfaces\trading_util.py", line 68, in get_portfolio_current_value
    get_bot().run_in_main_asyncio_loop(trade_manager.update_portfolio_and_currencies_current_value())
  File "f:\Python\Octobot\OctoBot\core\octobot.py", line 78, in run_in_main_asyncio_loop
    return self.task_manager.run_in_main_asyncio_loop(coroutine)
  File "f:\Python\Octobot\OctoBot\core\task_manager.py", line 148, in run_in_main_asyncio_loop
    return run_coroutine_in_asyncio_loop(coroutine, self.async_loop)
  File "f:\Python\Octobot\OctoBot\tools\asyncio_tools.py", line 36, in run_coroutine_in_asyncio_loop
    raise e
  File "f:\Python\Octobot\OctoBot\tools\asyncio_tools.py", line 30, in run_coroutine_in_asyncio_loop
    return future.result(DEFAULT_FUTURE_TIMEOUT)
  File "F:\Python\Octobot\python373\lib\concurrent\futures\_base.py", line 434, in result
    raise TimeoutError()
concurrent.futures._base.TimeoutError
